question: Who has been appointed as a new Chairman of Export Promotion Council for Handicraft (EPCH)?
explanation: Ravinder Kumar Passi has been appointed to the post of chairman of the Export Promotion Council for Handicrafts (EPCH). He succeeded O P Prahladka. EPCH is a non-profit organisation, with an objective to promote, support, protect, maintain and increase the export of handicrafts.
